head.title: Elmsford Office Complex Sold for $42.7 Million

hedline.hl1: Elmsford Office Complex Sold for $42.7 Million

abstract.p: Mack-Cali Realty Corp acquires Taxter Corp Park, office complex in Elmsford, NY, for $42.7 million from group made up of Morgan Stanley Real Estate Fund and Hines (S)

block.p: Mack-Cali Realty Corporation has acquired Taxter Corporate Park, a 17-acre office complex in Elmsford, for $42.7 million. The complex, which is 90.2 percent leased to 22 tenants, is across the street from another Mack-Cali office property near the intersection of I-87 and I-287. Mitchell E. Hersh, chief executive officer, said the acquisition indicated his company's confidence in Westchester's strengthening commercial real estate market. Mack-Cali has interests in 266 properties in 12 states and the District of Columbia. The seller was a group made up of the Morgan Stanely Real Estate Fund and Hines.
